1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 # Libs
4 import os
5 import time
6 
7 import rospy
8 from sqlite3 import OperationalError
9 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init
10 
11 from niryo_robot_system_api_client import system_api_client
12 
13 from niryo_robot_database.SQLiteDAO import SQLiteDAO
14 from niryo_robot_database.FilePath import FilePath, UnknownFilePathException
15 from niryo_robot_database.Version import Version, UnknownVersionException
16 
17 # msg
18 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus, SoftwareVersion
19 from niryo_robot_database.msg import FilePath as FilePathMsg, Setting as SettingMsg
20 
21 # srv
22 from niryo_robot_database.srv import SetSettings, GetSettings, AddFilePath, GetAllByType, RmFilePath
23 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import GetString
24 
25 
26 class DatabaseNode:
27 
28  def __init__(self):
29  rospy.logdebug("Database Node - Entering in Init")
30 
31  self.db_path = os.path.expanduser(rospy.get_param('~database_path'))
32 
33  if not os.path.isfile(self.db_path):
34  raise RuntimeError('Database Node - Unable to open the database.')
35 
36  sqlite_dao = SQLiteDAO(self.db_path)
37 
38  rospy.Service('~settings/set', SetSettings, self.__callback_set_settings)
39  rospy.Service('~settings/get', GetSettings, self.__callback_get_settings)
40  self.__setting_update_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~setting_update', SettingMsg, queue_size=5)
41 
42  self.__file_paths = FilePath(sqlite_dao)
43  rospy.Service('~file_paths/add', AddFilePath, self.__callback_add_file_path)
44  rospy.Service('~file_paths/rm', RmFilePath, self.__callback_rm_file_path)
45  rospy.Service(
46  '~file_paths/get_all_by_type',
47  GetAllByType,
48  self.__callback_get_all_by_type,
49  )
50 
51  self.__version = Version(sqlite_dao)
52 
53  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/software_version',
54  SoftwareVersion,
55  self.__sw_callback,
56  queue_size=1)
57 
58  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
59  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
60 
61  rospy.logdebug("Database Node - Node Started")
62 
63  def __callback_set_settings(self, req):
64  response = system_api_client.set_setting(req.name, req.value)
65  if not response.success:
66  return CommandStatus.DATABASE_DB_ERROR, response.detail
67 
68  self.__setting_update_publisher.publish(req.name, req.value, req.type)
69  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Settings successfully set'
70 
71  def __callback_get_settings(self, req):
72  response = system_api_client.get_setting(req.name)
73  if not response.success:
74  return CommandStatus.DATABASE_DB_ERROR, response.detail, ''
75  value = response.data[req.name]
76  value_type = response.data['type']
77 
78  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, value, value_type
79 
80  def __callback_add_file_path(self, req):
81  try:
82  row_id = self.__file_paths.add_file_path(req.type, req.name, req.path)
83  except OperationalError as e:
84  return CommandStatus.DATABASE_DB_ERROR, str(e)
85  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, str(row_id)
86 
87  def __callback_get_all_by_type(self, req):
88  try:
89  filepaths = self.__file_paths.get_all_by_type(req.type)
90  except OperationalError as e:
91  rospy.logwarn('[Database Node] OperationalError: {}'.format(str(e)))
92  return CommandStatus.DATABASE_DB_ERROR, []
93 
94  res = [
95  FilePathMsg(id=x['id'], type=x['type'], name=x['name'], date=x['date'], path=x['path']) for x in filepaths
96  ]
97 
98  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, res
99 
100  def __callback_rm_file_path(self, req):
101  self.__file_paths.rm_file_path(req.id)
102  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully deleted'
103 
104  def __sw_callback(self, msg):
105  motors_names = ['motor_1', 'motor_2', 'motor_3', 'motor_4', 'motor_5', 'motor_6', 'end_effector']
106  for motor_name, motor_version in zip(motors_names, msg.stepper_firmware_versions):
107  self.__version.set(motor_name, motor_version)
108  time.sleep(5)
109 
110 
111 if __name__ == "__main__":
112  sentry_init()
113 
114  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_database', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
115  try:
116  node = DatabaseNode()
117  rospy.spin()
118  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
119  pass
